long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clevermail is an innovative AI-powered email assistant that seamlessly integrates with Gmail via a Chrome extension. It enhances your email experience by generating personalized, professional emails based on your inputs and business context. With features like multilingual support and direct email sending, Clevermail is transforming the way professionals handle their email communication
